title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 63.10 - Other business
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 63.10 - Other business

State Regulations

Upon application to the State Liquor Authority and
approval thereof, a licensed farm winery or licensed winery may engage in
another business upon the winery premises. The authority will employ the
following criteria in determining whether such application shall be
approved: (a) the other business must
be consistent with the conservation, production and enhancement of New York

State agricultural lands; and
(b) the other business must have a positive impact upon the community and area in
the vicinity of the winery or farm winery. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
63.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
